The sweater runs a lil big,  but it is still very cute.
Is now my favorite sweater.  Very soft and warm.  Received allot of compliments on it.
I LOVE this sweater. Bought one for a friend too! Soft & very comfortable. Just as pictured

Nice sweater and the material is so soft and cozy for those cold days
This sweater is cute and unique. The cowl neck gets warm so be sure to only wear it when it’s very cold out. But overall, I love this sweater!
This sweater is BEAUTIFUL - very well made - super comfortable - and the sleeve design is so 70s retro - it's like wearing ART!!!  Would buy again :-)
Looks better online, quality is not so great, threads are coming apart a little.
I love this sweater's sleeves. It runs one size larger, and the fabric is weird, but I like the style. I ordered the navy blue and would recommend purchasing it.

If you buy this, keep in mind that it’s not very long. It’s a beautiful sweater, but I had to return it b/c it was almost a crop top on me. I’m only 5’6 for reference.

This sweater is unique with the crocheted sleeves.. comes in popular colors.. the only problem was that it’s a very loosely knit sweater.. light weight.. c good for spring.. I wanted a heavier knit.. a warmer sweater .. just not the right knitted density otherwise I love the styling
Love the color!

This is : soft, cute, fits well, feels nice. I wish it came with a slightly lower neck line. This is high neck cover neck for cold winter. Sweater is not too heavy, not too thick ,not too bulky, not too warm. It is really comfortable, nice weight. Looks great. I got compliments. It's a loose sweater in body and arms.
Very pretty, a bit short, but true to size. Soft, not heavy, good quality.
It is very cute! That being said, the flowers are poorly made and several were already coming apart when I received the item.
Sweater is nice, it’s a little thinner than I expected it definitely needs an under shirt if you actually want to be warm but it’s very cute and I’m excited to wear it
Nice sweater!  Looks very warm and well made.  Timely shipping.  Joan M.

I purchased the black one! I am just torn.. I think it would be better as a crewneck rather than turtleneck. The crochet arms let the air flow in with the wide holes. To keep warm, a long armed undershirt would need to be worn. I’m keeping it though because it’s a good quality and very pretty!

It is a lovely rust / orangey red with boutique style colorful crochet details on the sleeves. It may run a bit large. It is soft and a delight to wear. I got compliments on it and recommend. It is totally comfortable, not at all sheer, and for a sweater of it's size it's an in between light and heavy weight. It is enjoyable to wear inside and outside.
A little oversized, but so cute tucked into jeans.  Fun boho look for winter! Not too thick, very comfortable! Decent quality.
Pretty but the body is short. Not quite midriff but not very long. Cute but don’t lift up your arms unless you want everyone to see your middle. I don’t want that! Warmer than expected.

I am average height at 5'6", the sleeves could've been a bit longer.  If you have long torso/long arms I do not recommend this sweater at all.  Neck is odd & there is no front/back, so I've no clue if on backwards or not.  Overall the tan sweater is ok, material is fine & worth the $20 paid but I wouldn't pay more than that.

This seater is warm and comfortable. I love it
I get so many compliments on this sweater!  Love it!
love the way it looks  just wish it had marked the front from the back...there was no tag on the back

评论概述: Probably my most favorite sweater of all time!
评论详情: If you like creative sweaters, this is the one to get!  It has flowers down the side of the sweater which makes it attractive and cute.  I would recommend sizing down if you don't like it to be too loose.  The sleeves are a little long on me and it is lightweight.  So, wear a tank underneath to keep warm..

评论概述: Cute but thin and cheap looking

I can’t wait to wear this sweater. Very cute and good quality.
OMG___amazon--do better!!!!  Did not look much like the pic!!  super cheap--give it a pass people!
I don’t always leave reviews, but when I do it’s because its worth it. Highly recommend, comfy, CUTE as all get out.

My husband ordered this for me and I was pleasantly surprised how much I love it! I was expecting it to not be warm due to the crochet sleeves, but it's actually very warm. The pattern is beautiful and classy, plus the material is very soft so all in all, I would highly recommend!

The Flower crocheted on the arm of the sweater is so nice! the colors are bright and the design has little to no flaws. The sweater overall is fairly comfortable causing no itchy or scratchy feeling but it is very much see through so you might want to wear a sports bra under it or even a tank top as it's very breezy underneath.

Out of the shipping bag, this ZAFUL Flower Turtleneck Sweater for Women Crochet Regan Sleeve Sweater is ready to wear with no creasing or odors from shipping. It is a very lightweight synthetic knit, so it's just fine for the Southen California climate where I live. But it you're looking for a warm sweater, you might want to layer this. I ordered an XL but should have sized down and it's an ample fit. I ordered the khaki and have loved pairing it with jeggings and boots. The crochet looks great but I will be hand-washing it to keep it intact. Enjoy!

评论概述: if the product is worth the money
评论详情: I love this sweater!  Fits just right too

This is such a cute boho sweater, the crochet sleeves add such a fun vibe! I got my normal size and am happy with it. I plan to later this over a long sleeve body suit in winter because I’m in the north, but I think it be great for warmer climates as well, just for those cooler days. You would want to be careful washing the crochet, like maybe in a lingerie bag or something, just so nothing catches or pulls them. I think the price is very fair for the quality; I paid over $50 for a sweater similar to this at the mall, and it fell apart in about 2 washes. This is better quality for less money.

Granny squares and comfy sweaters are big in high school right now and so my daughter was thrilled with this offering from ZAFUL. Made in China from 100% acrylic, the manufacturer recommends cold water wash. To protect the knit, I wash this in a zippered, mesh garment bag and then lay it flat to dry. I spread it out on top of the dryer and let the residual warmth from the dryer help to quickly dry, yet preserve the shape of this sweater. For size reference, my daughter is 5'4" 120lbs, 22" waist, 32A. She is showing the printed-white option in a size small. Overall, she is very happy and will get a lot of use out of this fall, winter, and even into spring. The lighter color is a bit sheer, she tried this on over a t-shirt and you can see the t-shirt's logo through the knit. When wearing this out, she pairs it with a cream colored camisole.
Bought the pink and was so amazed how soft the sweater was and the pink is such a beautiful color. Got it in a large and the fit was great.

I am 5ft 165 38D 38 waist 44 hips. I got the L. I think it runs a bit big and I could've gotten the M. I can usually get.away with a M in tops. Sometimes clothed that are oversized in amazon still run small so I sized up to make sure i got the baggy look and I sure did. Sweater is nice and soft the crocheted flowers are a different pattern of colors on each sleeve. Sweater is acrylic so not the most luxe of material.but it feels good and it should hold up. One flower had a little thread poking out but everything else was good with the weave. Not super heavy in thickness but will keep you warm on a fall day. I will update if it falls apart.
I'm a sucker for granny squares and I love this sweater.  It is super soft and looks great.

This sweater is very cute with the crocheted flowers on the sleeve.  It is pretty lightweight so it can be worn alone, or with an added layer for extra warmth.  The sweater fit perfectly, too, and sometimes I have trouble with sleeves being just a tad too long.  I can wear this sweater with a pair of jeans for a night out or with a a nicer pant for work.

I really love the sleeve detail on this sweater, it is unique and fun. It is not an overly heavy sweater which is great for Southern California. I am not too sure how this is going to hold up, the fabric is not the best and I can see where it may fall apart in the future which is a huge bummer because it really is so cute. I love the contrast of the black against the colorful crochet sleeves. I took one star off because the quality just is not there but I still really love it and plan to wear it as many times as I can before it falls apart.

I am absolutely in love with this sweater. The quality is fantastic and the fit is perfect. The crocheted sleeve detail is absolutely amazing and adds so much to this sweater. It looks like something that you would buy in a boutique.

Very comfortable and soft sweater. The fabric is not very heavy but a lighter weave, and it is not itchy on my skin. I would wear this with an undershirt in the dead of winter but for fall I think it will keep me very warm. The sleeves are beautiful and add just the right amount of boho style to this sweater. I've dressed it up with a skirt or down with shorts and Van's- it's a versatile item. It fits me perfectly with enough room and the length isnt too cropped. This would make a great gift!

My wife loves this sweater. She said it fits true to size, hides her belly, and the sleeves are full. The neck isn't too tight, not quite a cowl neck, but it's loose enough to keep you from feeling like you're being choked. And the crochet detailing is incredibly unique .

评论概述: ZAFUL Turtleneck Flower Crochet Sweater for women
评论详情: This is a really soft sweater.  I got a size L and it fits well, that is it's loose enough to be comfortable and easily go over another layer in cold weather.  The crochet squares on the arms are fun and colorful and add just enough detail.  There's no tag at the neckline to be able to tell front from back, they look exactly the same to me.

I got white in small size and its such a beauty!  I can visualize myself wearing it with blue jeans in a cold and sunny day! Its warm and comfortable.  The artwork in the sleeves just make it pop out so much!  Highly recommended!

This sweater is so nostalgic, it reminds me of my Grandmothers original hand made quilt. I think every family had one in the 80s! The texture is kind of similar too but this is softer. It just gives me a warm fuzzy felling putting it on. I've had a lot of compliments on it. Unique and original sweater design. I love it, really fun. The crochet is a little eyelet so some air gets through.

评论概述: Different & fun - love the pattern on here!
评论详情: I ordered this sweater for my wife to try, because of the colorful flowers on the sleeves - she loves clothing like this!  She said that the sweater itself ran a bit large, but knows that it's supposed to be oversized anyway!  She loved the detail on the sleeves and said that the yarn was soft and will wash well.  The only "complaint" was that she couldn't quite figure out what to do with the collar. She said she feels it should either be longer (to make it easier to roll) or shorter (to fit more like a mock turtleneck). Fortunately, she is good with a needle and thread and said it will be easy to modify a bit!  She recommends!

The picture doesn't do it justice. This is a super nice and colorfully fun sweater! It's so different than anything I've seen that I feel like it was custom-made just for me! So cute! And perfect for all ages! Teens to older adults. It has a super soft turtle neck and can be dressy or casual. It fits true to size (I ordered an XL and it's a slimming fit - looks good!) This is a definite 5 stars from me!
This item feels cheap and is thin. The turtleneck is too big and is annoying. It’s also see through. The only redeeming quality are the sleeves which are cute.

I was drawn to this for the solid tone appearance of the torso, with the addition of colorful crochet flowers on the sleeves. I find this acrylic ribbed sweater unique and rather appealing in black. I ordered large as I normally do. I now believe I could have easily downsized to medium, as well. I could not make sense of the size chart online for I did not understand which diagram applied to this particular sweater. The shoulders are puffy and loose. I find it soft and comfortable.  The drawbacks to me are a number of imperfections, like extra orange string hanging out from over the right shoulder which seems irrelevant to the design or manufacturing. I think this is very casual, as if for a stay-at-home day by the fire or cooking and doing dishes. Keep in mind that one’s skin or shirt underneath will show through the big holes in the sleeves surrounding the flowers. This may or may not be a drawback to some.  Although this sweater could keep me warmer on a fall day, I also find it rather thin. I notice that my lightweight t-shirt underneath, belts, buckles, necklaces all show through the sweater shape for a bit of lumpier look than normal. I was disappointed in this. However, overall, I love the uniqueness, color, and comfort.

The colorful crochet flowers on the sleeves of the sweater really make it a lot more fun while also being subtle. The sweater is soft and comfortable. It fits well and is warm. I love the trendy oversized look with the pops of color.

This is a super cute sweater. The colors are beautiful, the fabric is okay. It’s not super thick. I kinda wish it was a little bigger, I probably should’ve ordered a size up. It’s comfortable from trying it on - I live in Florida where it’s 800 degrees so I won’t be wearing it any time soon.

This is a very beautiful crochet sweater. The color is bright and the flowers on the sleeves are also very pretty and colorful. The turtl;eneck is comfortable and will be perfect for the winter season.  Family member really liked the sweater and found the fit to be pretty comfortable. This will be a good sweater to wear during the holidays. Very nice purchase!
This turtleneck sweater is sized correctly and feels and looks great, feels like a hug 🫂  Super pleased great purchase! Also great for gifting. I highly recommend this sweater!

The colours look like left over yarn is used instead of the colour coordinated ones in the picture. Lower quality than expected for the price. Fit is baggy and oversized and it is very light not heavy. I was hoping to wear this over an orange dress but the sleeves now do not match.
